json_to_edit.voice_over: The melody echoes through my subconscious, a siren's call I can't escape.
json_to_edit.description: Luna finds herself in a surreal dreamscape, pursued by an eerie melody.
json_to_edit.name: Melody of Dreams
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Luna is haunted by a mysterious melody in her dreams, unable to wake or escape.

qa.action: Luna stands in a misty, ever-shifting dreamscape, looking lost and confused.

hf.action: Luna turns her head, trying to locate the source of the mysterious music.

tr.action: Luna's eyes widen in fear as the melody grows louder and more insistent.

xc.action: Luna runs through the shifting dreamscape, the melody pursuing her relentlessly.

ka.action: The dreamscape twists and warps around Luna, becoming more nightmarish.

fn.action: Luna's eye snaps open, filled with terror, as she realizes she can't wake up.

edit_command: Add a new shot before each existing shot, but don't change anything else in the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: The melody echoes through my subconscious, a siren's call I can't escape.
updated_json.description: Luna finds herself in a surreal dreamscape, pursued by an eerie melody.
updated_json.name: Melody of Dreams
updated_json.scene_summary: Luna is haunted by a mysterious melody in her dreams, unable to wake or escape.

zx.action: A swirling mist reveals the ethereal dreamscape, setting the stage for Luna's entrance.

qa.action: Luna stands in a misty, ever-shifting dreamscape, looking lost and confused.

wy.action: Through Luna's eyes, we see the dreamscape shift and morph, hinting at unseen dangers.

hf.action: Luna turns her head, trying to locate the source of the mysterious music.

uv.action: We see what Luna sees: shadowy figures forming and dissipating in the mist.

tr.action: Luna's eyes widen in fear as the melody grows louder and more insistent.

st.action: Luna's hair and nightgown flow as if underwater, emphasizing the surreal nature of the dreamscape.

xc.action: Luna runs through the shifting dreamscape, the melody pursuing her relentlessly.

rq.action: From above, we see Luna running through a maze-like pattern in the misty dreamscape.

ka.action: The dreamscape twists and warps around Luna, becoming more nightmarish.

po.action: The entire dreamscape pulsates with the rhythm of the melody, closing in on Luna.

fn.action: Luna's eye snaps open, filled with terror, as she realizes she can't wake up.

label.rationale: we will add a new shot before each existing shot in the scene, effectively doubling the number of shots from 6 to 12. this will require updating the "number_of_shots" field, adding new shots to the "shots" dictionary, and modifying the "list_display_order" to include the new shots. we'll create new, creative shots that complement the existing ones and maintain the dreamlike, haunting atmosphere of the scene. the new shots will be inserted before each existing shot, alternating between the new and original shots in the updated list_display_order.
